verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764> upon Sheminith <WH8067>, A Psalm <WH4210> of David <WH1732>. Help <WH3467> <WH8685>, YY <WH3068>; for the godly man <WH2623> ceaseht <WH1584> <WH8804>; for the faithful <WH539> <WH8803> fail <WH6461> <WH8804> from among the children <WH1121> of men <WH120>.

They speak <WH1696> <WH8762> vanity <WH7723> every one <WH376> with his neighbour <WH7453>: with flattering <WH2513> lips <WH8193> and with a double <WH3820> heart <WH3820> do they speak <WH1696> <WH8762>.
The YY <WH3068> shall cut off <WH3772> <WH8686> all flattering <WH2513> lips <WH8193>, and the tongue <WH3956> that speaketh <WH1696> <WH8764> proud <WH1419> things:
Who have said <WH559> <WH8804>, With our tongue <WH3956> will we prevail <WH1396> <WH8686>; our lips <WH8193> are our own: who is lord <WH113> over us?

For the oppression <WH7701> of the poor <WH6041>, for the sighing <WH603> of the needy <WH34>, now will I arise <WH6965> <WH8799>, saith <WH559> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068>; I will set <WH7896> <WH8799> him in safety <WH3468> from him that puffeth <WH6315> <WH8686> at him.

The words <WH565> of the YY <WH3068> are pure <WH2889> words <WH565>: as silver <WH3701> tried <WH6884> <WH8803> in a furnace <WH5948> of earth <WH776>, purified <WH2212> <WH8794> seven times <WH7659>.
Thou shalt keep <WH8104> <WH8799> them, O YY <WH3068>, thou shalt preserve <WH5341> <WH8799> them from this <WH2098> generation <WH1755> for ever <WH5769>.
The wicked <WH7563> walk <WH1980> <WH8691> on every side <WH5439>, when the vilest <WH2149> men <WH1121> <WH120> are exalted <WH7311> <WH8800>.
